SCTX:
Begin passageScript 
short button 
short messageOn 
; this part gives you your choice on activating the door 
if ( OnActivate == 1 ) 
MessageBox "Do you wish to crawl through this space?" "Yes" "No" 
set messageOn to 1 
endif 
if ( messageOn == 1 ) 
set button to GetButtonPressed 
;resets the variable so you can use the door multiple times 
if ( button >= 0 ) 
set messageOn to 0 
endif 
;should send you through the door normally 
if ( button == 0 ) 
Activate 
; should just reset the script, allowing you to do it again 
elseif ( button == 1 ) 
set button to 0 
return 
endif 
endif 
End passageScript
